description.en: By comparing the Skyrme model with the strong-coupling model of the pion-nucleon interaction in the static limit the collective coordinates in the Skyrme model are shown to be proportional to the square roots of the fields of the pions bound to the bare nucleons in the strong-coupling model. © 1988 The American Physical Society.
